# vImageCVImageFormat.Format.formatOneComponent8

**Case**

An 8-bit, single-component pixel format with black equal to zero.

## Declaration

```swift
case formatOneComponent8
```

## Single-component format constants

- **vImageCVImageFormat.Format.formatOneComponent16Half**: A little-endian 16-bit, single-componennt pixel format.
- **vImageCVImageFormat.Format.formatOneComponent32Float**: A little-endian 32-bit, single-component pixel format.
title: vImageCVImageFormat.Format.formatOneComponent8
